0110100111011100 0110011100001010 1 -> sum: 1101000011100111, cout: 0
1100101110101110 1110011001010001 0 -> sum: 1011000111111111, cout: 1
1111111101110001 1010011101100001 1 -> sum: 1010011011010011, cout: 1

1101100011101100 1101111000011110 0 -> sum: 1011011100001010, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
